"It's not about what everyone else is doing, it's about what works best for you. Find your own unique approach to completing the task at hand."
"Perhaps you're just trying too hard to keep up with others. Take a step back and focus on your own progress, one step at a time."
"Don't compare yourself to others. Each person has their own strengths and weaknesses, and it's important to recognize and embrace your own unique qualities."
"Maybe you're not being realistic about what you're capable of. Set achievable goals for yourself and don't be afraid to ask for help if you need it."
"Remember that everyone has their own learning style. If what's working for others isn't working for you, try experimenting with different methods to find what works best for you."
